contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 4, 1979 D Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section)
Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Manchester District Contest manchester-district-contest-fourth-section
Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and shield, 2nd £25 and cup, 3rd £15 and cup. Bands from all three sections played in one section but were only judged against bands in their section. 11 bands competed.
Dec. 27, 2014, 4:55 p.m. Dec. 27, 2014, 5:03 p.m.
1 Kingsway Youth C. C. Colwell
2 St. John's Mossley Band Harold Robinson
3 Eccles Borough Band Wilf Hudson
4 Droylsden & District R. C. Richards
Unknown Result Schreiber Peter Lockett
Unknown Result Central Manchester Silver J. Costa
Unknown Result Windsor Salford J. Clayton
Unknown Result Port Sunlight Lyceum Brass G. J. Ellis
Unknown Result Miles Platting Mission Philip Goodwin
Unknown Result Ashtonian Brass B. Cheshire
Unknown Result Stockport Silver Brian Lamb
